Plataforma para auxilio de Migrantes e R: Platform for Assistance to Migrants and Refugees
Sobre_Tcc: This project aims to assist, expand, and improve the quality of services provided by the Clinic of Fundamental Social Rights, through the development of an accessible platform for information on the social rights of migrants and refugees, as well as the provision of legal advisory services and guidance on how to address their needs in the country in a simple and quick manner
Sobre_Clinica: An extension project of the State University of Western Paraná, Foz do Iguaçu campus, which aims to primarily understand and disseminate public policies for the protection and promotion of the fundamental and social rights of migrants through the methodology of legal clinics
